item.title: 为什么青春期会触动神经
item.description:
联合创作人杰克-索恩（Jack Thorne）讲述了社交媒体在现实和想象中的青少年焦虑中扮演的角色。【原文：

Co-creator Jack Thorne talks about social media’s role in real—and imagined—teenage angst.

】

item.title: 奢侈品股票分析师警告关税动荡将冲击客户财富
item.description: 分析师警告说，奢侈品制造商需要担心的不是关税，而是随之而来的股市大跌对客户财富的打击。【原文：It’s not tariffs that luxury-goods makers need to worry about, but the hit to client wealth from the ensuing stock market carnage, analysts warn.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长诺特称利率处于中性区间上限
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员克拉斯-克诺（Klaas Knot）表示，目前利率已接近不再限制经济活动的水平。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Klaas Knot said interest rates are now close to levels where they no longer restrict economic activity.】

item.title: 埃及将迎来温和的夏季开端，促进欧洲的液化天然气采购
item.description: 埃及夏季开始时的温和天气推迟了对液化天然气进口量增加的需求，并在关键的储存季节到来之前为欧洲留出了更多的燃料。【原文：A mild start to summer weather in Egypt is delaying the need for higher imports of liquefied natural gas, and leaving more of the fuel available for Europe ahead of a crucial stockpiling season.】

item.title: 印度央行立场和流动性誓言令印度债券抵御全球大跌
item.description: 由于印度央行放宽了政策立场，并表示将确保向银行提供充足的流动性，印度债券上涨，一反全球大跌的颓势。【原文：Indian bonds gained, defying a global selloff, as the central bank eased its policy stance and said it would ensure sufficient liquidity to banks.】

item.title: 为规避关税，个人电脑出货量四年来增长最快
item.description: 从苹果公司到戴尔科技公司等公司在关税来临前加快了在全球的产品交付，个人电脑出货量创下了自大流行病以来的最快增长速度。【原文：PC shipments grew at their fastest pace since the pandemic after companies from Apple Inc. to Dell Technologies Inc. hastened product deliveries around the world before tariffs hit.】

item.title: 首席执行官离职后，拉脱维亚寻求邻国投资波罗的海航空公司
item.description: 拉脱维亚总理表示，拉脱维亚已就投资波罗的海航空公司（Air Baltic Corp AS）一事与邻国进行了接触，此前这家国有航空公司在计划首次公开募股之前解雇了首席执行官。【原文：Latvia has reached out to neighboring countries about investing in Air Baltic Corp AS, its premier said, after the state-owned airline dismissed its chief executive officer ahead of plans for an initial public offering.】

item.title: 贾尚卡尔称印度的关税战略是寻求美国贸易协议
item.description: 印度外交部长苏布拉马尼亚姆-杰尚卡尔（Subrahmanyam Jaishankar）表示，印度应对美国破坏性关税的战略是与唐纳德-特朗普总统的政府敲定贸易协定。【原文：India’s strategy to counter the US’s damaging tariffs is to finalize a trade agreement with President Donald Trump’s government, Foreign Minister Subrahmanyam Jaishankar said.】

item.title: 维克托-什韦茨谈特朗普的历史性革命举措
item.description:
如何理解我们现在所看到的。【原文：

How to understand what we're seeing right now.

】

item.title: 约 90% 被送往萨尔瓦多的移民没有美国犯罪记录
item.description: 特朗普政府官员将上个月被驱逐到萨尔瓦多监狱的这些人描述为 "最坏中的最坏"，暗示他们是参与谋杀、强奸和绑架的帮派成员。【原文：Trump administration officials have described the men deported to El Salvador prisons last month as “the worst of the worst,” suggesting they were gang members involved in murder, rape and kidnapping.】

item.title: 维克托-什韦茨谈特朗普的革命性历史举措
item.description: 我们应该如何理解特朗普的关税政策？显然，它们对股市的影响非常糟糕。小企业似乎对它们恨之入骨。能源公司也不喜欢。美国制造商在谈论关税将如何使制造业更加困难。然而，我们有关税。那么，谁会从中受益呢？有什么意义？我们应该如何理解美国历史上的这一时刻？在本期节目中，我们将与我们最喜爱的嘉宾之一、Macqu全球办公桌战略主管维克多-什韦茨（Viktor Shvets）进行对话。【原文：How should we make sense of the Trump tariffs? They’ve been terrible for the stock market, obviously. Small businesses seem to hate them. Energy companies aren’t fans either. US manufacturers are talking about how the tariffs will make manufacturing harder. And yet we have them. So who stands to benefit? What’s the point? And how should we understand this moment in American history? On this episode we speak with one of our favorite guests, Viktor Shvets, the head of global desk strategy at Macqu】

item.title: 数百万美国人无法动用房屋净值
item.description: 一项新的研究发现，美国人近年来积累了大量住房财富；但数百万房主发现，他们实际上无法获得这些财富。【原文：Americans have amassed plenty of housing wealth in recent years — but millions of homeowners are finding they’re effectively locked out of accessing it, a new study found.】

item.title: 全球债券下跌，英国借贷成本创 1998 年以来新高
item.description: 随着美国长期利率的飙升波及全球，英国的借贷成本飙升至 1998 年以来的最高点。【原文：The UK’s borrowing costs surged to the highest since 1998 as a jump in long-dated US rates radiated around the world.】

item.title: 美股期货震荡，关税启动，中国征税成焦点
item.description: 随着唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税政策生效，美国股票期货出现波动，同时投资者密切关注与中国进行贸易谈判的可能性。【原文：US equity futures fluctuated as President Donald Trump’s tariffs took effect, while investors closely monitored the potential for trade talks with China.】

item.title: 日本设备制造商选择越南避开美国对华关税
item.description: 日本电子制造商 Sourcenext 公司周三宣布，该公司计划在越南建立一个新的生产基地，以避免美国对中国征收惩罚性关税。【原文：Japanese electronics maker Sourcenext Corp. plans to set up a new manufacturing base in Vietnam, avoiding the US’s punishing tariffs on China, the company announced Wednesday.】

item.title: 关税紧张局势推动中国免税店股票大涨
item.description: 经营免税店的中国公司股价大涨，因为预计在全面征收关税后，这些公司的商品定价可能比主流零售商更具竞争力。【原文：Shares of Chinese companies operating duty-free stores jumped on expectation that pricing of their goods may become more competitive than mainstream retailers after sweeping tariffs.】

item.title: 中东最新液化天然气进口商准备接收首批货物
item.description: 巴林最快将于本月接收第一批液化天然气货物，成为随着能源需求激增而进口这种燃料的最新一个中东国家。【原文：Bahrain will receive its first liquefied natural gas cargo as soon as this month, becoming the latest Middle Eastern nation to import the fuel as energy demand soars.】

item.title: 劳力士金表需求急剧上升，金属创下历史新高
item.description: 随着贵金属价格的飙升和收藏家对更华丽表款的追捧，二手劳力士 SA 金表的需求也在不断上升。【原文：Demand for used gold Rolex SA watches is rising as precious metal prices soar and collectors seek dressier models.】

item.title: 当世界最需要避风港时，避风港资产却在衰退
item.description: 在多年来最剧烈的一次市场大跌中，避险资产的表现乏善可陈，这使得投资者开始寻求新的保护方式。【原文：A lackluster run for haven assets during one of the most acute market selloffs in years has left investors seeking new forms of protection.】

item.title: Seven & i 的指导失误增加了收购要约的压力
item.description: Seven & i Holdings Co. 预测本年度的营业利润和收入不及分析师预期，这增加了该公司在剥离超市和银行部门股权后寻找新增长点的压力。【原文：Seven & i Holdings Co. forecast operating profit and revenue for the current year that missed analyst estimates, adding to pressure on the company to find new avenues for growth after divesting stakes in its supermarket and banking units.】

item.title: 澳大利亚财政部长称澳大利亚有能力应对世界经济动荡
item.description: 澳大利亚财长吉姆-查默斯（Jim Chalmers）周三表示，澳大利亚有能力应对美国新关税制度带来的全球波动，因为货币市场越来越相信储备银行将在下个月大幅降息。【原文：Australia is well placed to deal with global volatility emanating from the new US tariff regime, Treasurer Jim Chalmers said Wednesday as money markets are increasingly confident the Reserve Bank will deliver an outsized interest-rate cut next month.】

item.title: 关税开始实施，欧洲天然气随更广泛的金融市场下跌
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普开始征收关税，欧洲天然气价格进一步下滑，对全球经济和能源需求造成打击。【原文：European natural gas prices slid further as US President Donald Trump’s tariffs kicked in, dealing a blow to the global economy and demand for energy.】

item.title: 特朗普关税生效，欧洲股市期货下挫
item.description: 随着美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的对等关税措施生效，欧洲股票期货周三暴跌，引发全球金融市场再度下挫。【原文：European stock futures tumbled on Wednesday as President Donald Trump’s reciprocal tariffs took effect, triggering a renewed selloff across global financial markets.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：特朗普加征关税，英国股市重陷低迷
亚洲国家承诺购买更多美国天然气以赢得关税减免
item.description: 从韩国到印尼，亚洲各国政府正急于签署从美国购买液化天然气的协议，希望借此减少与世界最大经济体之间的贸易顺差，并从美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的全面 "互惠 "关税中获得一些缓解。【原文：Asian governments from South Korea to Indonesia are rushing to sign up for liquefied natural gas purchases from the US, hoping to reduce trade surpluses with the world’s largest economy and secure some relief from President Donald Trump’s sweeping “reciprocal” tariffs.】

item.title: 期待已久的特朗普通话后，韩国期待达成 "重大 "贸易协议
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）与韩国代总统韩德洙（Han Duck-soo）在最后一刻通电话后，韩国正在寻求与美国达成一项 "重大 "贸易协议，这为这个受关税冲击严重的出口依赖型国家带来了一些缓解的前景。【原文：South Korea is seeking to cut a “big” trade deal with the US after a last-minute phone call between Donald Trump and Acting President Han Duck-soo raised the prospects of bringing some relief to the export-reliant nation hit hard by tariffs blitz.】

item.title: 国债 "热卖 "令全球长期收益率飙升
item.description: 随着贸易战的升级，人们对美国国债的避风港地位产生了怀疑，较长期限国债的抛售加速，加剧了全球等价债券的低迷。【原文：A selloff in longer-dated Treasuries accelerated, worsening the slump in bond equivalents across the globe, as an escalation in the trade war sowed doubts over the haven status of US government debt.】

item.title: 受关税影响，印度股市将创 2009 年以来亚洲股市最大涨幅
item.description: 由于唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税被认为对印度的前景影响相对有限，印度股市的表现有望创下自 2009 年以来的最大涨幅。【原文：Indian stocks are on pace to outperform regional peers by the most since 2009 as President Donald Trump’s tariffs are seen to have relatively limited impact on the country’s prospects.】

item.title: 104% 正在加倍愚蠢
item.description:
美国和中国都表示他们拥有作战手段，因此我们也就顺水推舟了。【原文：

We’re along for the ride, as both the US and China suggest they have the means to fight.

】

item.title: 中国对美国新关税立即采取报复行动
item.description: 中国没有立即对美国的新关税做出回应，这与前两次美国总统唐纳德-特朗普提高关税、中国政府在几分钟内做出反击的情况不同。【原文：China hasn’t immediately responded to the new US tariffs, a departure from the last two episodes when President Donald Trump hiked duties and Beijing hit back within minutes.】
